name: I See Monsters 1: DEMO
summary:
🎮 Survive the night in this chilling VR horror game.😨 Recreate your childhood nightmares as you sneak through Willy Walee School when no one’s around —But the school is different from the one you know during the day. 🌒🏫📄 Your mission: steal the exam paper you need to pass in five days. But be careful — he hates cheaters, and he’s watching. That’s his only purpose in life...
FREE slice demo of I See Monsters 1
